TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 21 hours ago, Imperial Star Destroyer said:
> 
> 
> I would like to change my name.  Could I have some help?
> 

What name?
Can I change my name to Hummingbird Aerospace, please?

> 
> 
> 7 minutes ago, Imperial Star Destroyer said:
> 
> 
> Can I change my name to Hummingbird Aerospace﻿, please?
> 

Yes, you may.

Twitch does not have the bits for ASCII  0x20 so the need of an 0x5F in between my name is a common solution.

Please insert a \_  and separate my name to  "Moesly\_Armlis"
